title: Aaron Rodgers, Lonzo Ball, NBA, & Steph Curry
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Lonzo Ball, NBA, & Steph Curry
description:
Colin explains why Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers is more like Pittsburgh Steelers QB Ben Roethlisberger than New England Patriots QB Tom Brady, more proof that Los Angeles Lakers G Lonzo Ball should be starting, the history of the NBA, and why Steph Curry should get more credit. Guests include Chris Broussard, Greg Cosell, Jordan Palmer, and Tim Hardaway.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
